alert.note: Alert for Atoka (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 11:17AM CST until March 10 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Norman OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Clear Boggy Creek near Caney affecting Atoka County.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC005-100530- /O.NEW.KOUN.FL.W.0001.230309T1717Z-230310T1630Z/ /CANO2.1.ER.230309T1618Z.230310T0000Z.230310T1030Z.NO/ 1117 AM CST Thu Mar 9 2023 ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clear Boggy Creek near Caney. * WHEN...From this morning to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Creek levels rise to slightly above bankfull stages in western Atoka County and the northeastern edge of Bryan County. High stages on small feeder streams result in even greater depths to mainstem bottomlands near their points of entry into Clear Boggy Creek. Only croplands... pastures... and some secondary rural roads are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 26.2 feet. - Forecast...The Clear Boggy Creek is expected to rise to a crest of 27.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
